data.text: @SenJonHusted Imagine how good it would be for the people of Ohio if those jobs went to them instead of Haitian's and h1b visa holders https://t.co/OUhEd0TwIj

@SenJonHusted Economic growth depends on sustained investment, strong workforce participation, and stable supply chains. Continued development can help support job creation and long‑term competitiveness for states and local communities.

@SenJonHusted Noncitizen voting in U.S. federal elections is an extremely rare phenomenon—virtually always accidental or isolated. There is no evidence of widespread illegal voting that could impact the outcome of major elections.
